mapper.select: SELECT cd.seq ,cd.cdName ,cd.cdUseNy ,cd.cdRegDateTime ,cd.cdModDateTime ,cd.codeGroup_seq ,cg.cgName FROM code cd JOIN codeGroup cg ON cg.seq = cd.codeGroup_seq WHERE 1=1 AND cdDelNy = 0 ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT cd.seq ,cd.cdName ,cd.cdUseNy ,cd.codeGroup_seq FROM code cd WHERE 1=1 AND cdDelNy = 0 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO code( cdName, cdUseNy, cdDelNy, cdRegDateTime, codeGroup_seq ) VALUES( #{cdName}, 0, 0, now(), #{codeGroup_seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE code SET cdName = #{cdName}, cdUseNy = #{cdUseNy}, cdModDateTime = now(), codeGroup_seq = #{codeGroup_seq} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT seq ,cdName FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND codeGroup_seq = #{codeGroup_seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
